item.title: Flink
item.description: What is it a distributed runtime uses pipelines for execution exactly-once state consistency lightweight checkpoint iterative processing windows semantics out-of-order processing Iteration control // set up execution environment env = ExecutionEnvironment.getExecutionEnvironment(); // get input data: // read the points and centroids from the provided paths // or fall back to default data points = getPointDataSet(params, env); centroids = getCentroidDataSet(params, env); // set number of bulk iterations for KMeans algorithm loop = centroids.

item.title: Facebook - memcached
item.description: Requirements real-time aggregate dispersed data access hot set scale refs [1,2,5,6,12,14,34,36] Front-end cluster read heavy workload (100:1 R/W) wide fanout handle failures 10 Mops/s Q: what is a wide fanout Multiple FE clusters single geo region control data replication data consistency 100 Mops/s Multiple regions muliple geo regions storage replication data consistency 1 Bops/s Pre-memcached High fanout data dependency graph for a small user request Look-aside cache why deletes over set
